sentences.sContent: The main reason for living in Spain is the weather.
sentences.sCn: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.sContent: What do you consider to be the main problem?
sentences.sCn: 你认为最主要的问题是什么？

sentences.sContent: Our main concern is that the children are safe.
sentences.sCn: 我们最关心的是保证孩子们的安全。

sentences.sContent: a summary of the main points of the agreement
the main aim of the meeting
I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
...the main activities in the region were historically steel and paper processing...
...one of the main settings for the release of tears...
...maybe you will mark main ideas in yellow...
...but let’s not miss the main point here...
...Students mark the main ideas and important details with a pen or pencil...
...What will be the woman’s main responsibility as a deputy director...
...Arroyo's main rental customers are European tourists...
...Foods sold à la carte separate from the main meal and are priced individually...
...Mclaughlin turned right on main street and 33rd street and hit Volkswagen rabbit...

synos.tran: 主要部分，要点；体力；[材]总管道
主要的，最重要的；全力的

phrases.pCn: 主体，主要部分；主船体；机身
主要部分，主体；主要零件
主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点

words.tran: 支柱；中流砥柱；主要的依靠；主桅支索
主要动力；（钟表）主发条；主要原因；主要动机

trans.tranOther: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind
